name: Invasion Defender (itch) (SafetySalamander)
description:
This is my 2DShooter project. I added the following changes:

  1. added a secondary gun for the player including:
    1. new input (right click)
    2. new porjectile mechanism and behavior
    3. ammo mechanism including ammo drops and display
  2. added boss enemy type with:
    1. unique weapons
    2. unique beahvior
  3.  Three unique levels:
    1. maze level without guns
    2. boss fight level
    3. infinite survival with increasing difficulty

Created by

Fredrik Kamphuis
